verbs.description: In Response to President Trump 's war of words with Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and the recent steel and aluminum tariffs on Canada , the European Union , and Mexico , Canadians [V: have] started to boycott U.S. goods , CTV News reported on Thursday .
